weapons.name: Staff
weapons.effect: Increase the range of channeled spell cards by 1 square.

weapons.name: Flail
weapons.effect: Can attack enemies behind partial cover.

weapons.name: Dual Blades
weapons.effect: If you channel a standard card, draw a card at the end of your turn.

weapons.name: Wand
weapons.effect: Once per turn, fix a channeled attack as if you spent a Strike/10 token.

armor.name: Heavy Armour
armor.effect: Gain +3 Defence. You cannot jump or be pushed, pulled, or carried.

trinkets.name: Bandolier
trinkets.effect: Add two consumable item slots. These can only hold items with the [Expendable] tag.

trinkets.name: Glider Cape
trinkets.effect: During your turn while airborne, you may move 1 square without spending movement points.

trinkets.name: Grappling Hook
trinkets.effect: During your turn, you may spend 3 movement points to pull yourself to a wall or ledge within 3 squares.

trinkets.name: Spellbook
trinkets.effect: Once per turn, you may discard a spell card to draw a spell card.

trinkets.name: Arcane Focus
trinkets.effect: Your channeled spells gain +1 to their attack rolls.

consumables.name: Health Potion
consumables.effect: [Expendable] Heal yourself or an adjacent ally for 25 HP.

consumables.name: Stamina Draught
consumables.effect: [Expendable] Gain 3 movement points and remove all Slow counters.

consumables.name: Smoke Bomb
consumables.effect: [Expendable] Create a 3x3 smoke cloud. Creatures in or behind the cloud have cover.

consumables.name: Flash Powder
consumables.effect: [Expendable] All enemies within 2 squares gain 1 Blind counter.

consumables.name: Antidote
consumables.effect: [Expendable] Remove all Poison counters from yourself or an adjacent ally.
